modmenu.descriptionTranslation.maplink: Synchronizes player positions, marker positions and area overlays from Bluemap, Dynmap, Pl3xMap or Squaremap with Xaero's Minimap and Worldmap. Also displays AFK time in the tab list.
maplink.title: Map Link
maplink.option.general.serverEntries.@To:
Add your servers here.
Click on the (+) on the left.
maplink.option.general.maxUpdateDelay.@T:
[between 1000 ms and 4000 ms]
By default, the update delay from the web-map is used.
However, many servers that update slower than once per second, actually support much higher rates.
Just experiment how far you can push it ☺
maplink.option.general.defaultY.@Tooltip: default Y coordinate for maps that don't provide Y coordinates
maplink.option.general.showPlayerWaypoin:
Uses xaeros's build-in player trackers instead of waypoints.
The scaling options from this mod don't apply to them.
Go into the xaero settings to configure player trackers
and if and how they are rendered as radar entities.
maplink.option.general.interpolationTime:
Makes movement of player tracker smoother.
0 disables the interpolation
maplink.option.general.enablePlayerIconW: Enable Head Icons on Player Waypoints
maplink.option.general.useMcHeadsPlayerN: Use Player Head Icons from MCHeads

Use this ONLY IF the web map doesn't provide (correct) player-head-icons!
For this setting to apply you need to:
Disconnect. Wait a few seconds. Reconnect.
maplink.option.general.playerWaypointCol:
Only for Player Waypoints without a head icon.
Doesn't effect Trackers!
maplink.option.general.showAfkInTabList: Show AFK Status in Tab List
AFK detection is only based on movement.
maplink.option.general.showAfkTimeInTabL: Show AFK Time in Tab List
Only shown if players AFK time is over the "Time Until AFK".
maplink.option.general.hideAfkMinutes: Hide AFK Minutes if AFK Time is Over 1 h
maplink.option.general.unknownAfkStateCo:
If a player doesn't move after you connected to the server
the mod doesn't know if they are AFK.
maplink.option.general.enableMarkerIcons: Enable Custom Icons on Marker Waypoints
maplink.option.general.showDefaultMarker:
If OFF: replaces default icons with text waypoints.
The Bluemap-default-icon is a svg, which is NOT supported!
...So yes... this setting is basically only here in case you like the default Dynmap house icon ☺
For this setting to apply you need to:
Disconnect. Wait a few seconds. Reconnect.
maplink.option.general.markerWaypointCol: Only for those without a custom icon.
maplink.option.general.blocksPerChunkThr: Chunks with less highlighted blocks will not be highlighted.
maplink.option.general.maxChunkArea.@Too:
Measured in bounding box area in Chunks.
⚠Setting this to high will cause the Area Markers to take very long to show.⚠
maplink.option.general.chatLogInDebugMod: Chat Logs in Debug Mode - Chat Spam...
maplink.option.ServerEntry.markerVisibil:
Let's you select from which layers markers are shown.
Set it to "Auto" to get all the layers from the web map.
Let's you select from which layers markers are shown.
Set the mode to "Auto" to get all the layers from the web map.
maplink.option.ServerEntry.individualMar:
Let's you blacklist or whitelist individual markers with specific words in their names.
(case-sensitive)
maplink.option.ServerEntry.markers.@Tool:
Let's you blacklist or whitelist individual markers with specific words in their names.
(case-sensitive)
maplink.option.ServerEntry.areaMarkerVis:
Let's you select from which layers area markers are shown.
Set it to "Auto" to get all the layers from the web map.
maplink.option.ServerEntry.areaMarkerLay:
Let's you select from which layers area markers are shown.
Set the mode to "Auto" to get all the layers from the web map.
maplink.option.ServerEntry.individualAre:
Let's you blacklist or whitelist individual area markers with specific words in their names.
(case-sensitive)
maplink.option.ServerEntry.areaMarkers.@:
Let's you blacklist or whitelist individual area markers with specific words in their names.
(case-sensitive)
maplink.option.ServerEntry.iconMarkerVis:
Let's you select from which layers icons are shown.
Set it to "Auto" to get all the layers from the web map.
maplink.option.ServerEntry.iconMarkerLay:
Let's you select from which layers icons are shown.
Set the mode to "Auto" to get all the layers from the web map.
maplink.option.ServerEntry.individualIco:
Let's you blacklist or whitelist individual icons on markers with specific words in the marker names.
(case-sensitive)
maplink.option.ServerEntry.icons.@Toolti:
Let's you blacklist or whitelist individual icons on markers with specific words in the marker names.
(case-sensitive)
maplink.option.friends.friendList.@Toolt:
Add your friends' names here.
Click on the (+) on the left.
maplink.option.friends.onlyShowFriendsWa: Only Show Player Waypoints / Trackers of Friends
maplink.option.friends.onlyShowFriendsIc: Only Show Player Head Waypoint Icons of Friends
maplink.option.friends.alwaysShowFriends: Always Show Player Waypoints / Trackers of Friends
Only bypasses max-distance and max-count checks!
Always Show Player Head Waypoint Icons of Friends
Only bypasses distance and max-count checks!
maplink.option.hud.hidePlayersInRange: Hide Waypoints / Trackers for Players in View Distance
maplink.option.hud.hidePlayersVisible: Hide Waypoints / Trackers for Players Visible on Screen
maplink.option.hud.playerTextScale: Scale for Player Waypoints Without Icon
maplink.option.hud.playerIconScale: Scale for Player Waypoints With Icon
maplink.option.hud.markerTextScale: Scale for Marker Waypoints Without Icon
maplink.option.hud.markerIconScale: Scale for Marker Waypoints With Icon
maplink.option.hud.minVisiblePlayerDista: Min Player Waypoint / Tracker Distance | For Visible Players
maplink.option.hud.minNotVisiblePlayerDi: Min Player Waypoint / Tracker Distance | For Not Visible Players
maplink.option.hud.maxPlayerWaypoints: Max Amount of Player Waypoints / Trackers
maplink.option.minimap.showPlayerWaypoin:
Xaero's MiniMap automatically renders tracked players on the entity radar
which will seemingly override this setting.
Go to the xaero radar settings to disable it.
maplink.option.minimap.hidePlayersInRang: Hide Waypoints / Trackers for Players in View Distance

Xaero's MiniMap automatically renders tracked players on the entity radar
which will seemingly override this setting.
Go to the xaero radar settings to disable it.
maplink.option.minimap.outOfBoundsPlayer: Show Player Waypoints / Trackers out of Bounds
"out of Bounds" means over the edge of the MiniMap
maplink.option.minimap.outOfBoundsMarker: Show Marker Waypoints out of Bounds
"out of Bounds" means over the edge of the MiniMap
maplink.option.minimap.playerTextScale: Scale for Player Waypoints Without Icon
maplink.option.minimap.playerIconScale: Scale for Player Waypoints With Icon
maplink.option.minimap.markerTextScale: Scale for Marker Waypoints Without Icon
maplink.option.minimap.markerIconScale: Scale for Marker Waypoints With Icon
maplink.option.minimap.maxPlayerWaypoint: Max Amount of Player Waypoints / Trackers
maplink.option.worldmap.showPlayerWaypoi:
Xaero's MiniMap / WorldMap automatically renders tracked players on the entity radar
which will seemingly override this setting.
Go to the xaero radar settings to disable it.
maplink.option.worldmap.hidePlayersInRan: Hide Waypoints / Trackers for Players in View Distance

Xaero's MiniMap / WorldMap automatically renders tracked players on the entity radar
which will seemingly override this setting.
Go to the xaero radar settings to disable it.
maplink.option.worldmap.waypointIconBack: Show Background for Waypoints With Icons
maplink.option.worldmap.playerTextScale: Scale for Player Waypoints Without Icon
maplink.option.worldmap.playerIconScale: Scale for Player Waypoints With Icon
maplink.option.worldmap.markerTextScale: Scale for Marker Waypoints Without Icon
maplink.option.worldmap.markerIconScale: Scale for Marker Waypoints With Icon
maplink.option.worldmap.maxPlayerWaypoin: Max Amount of Player Waypoints / Trackers
